entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
